name: Conganauts
description:
A multidimensional party-puzzler!  While leading the conga line over to the bar to refill on beer, you accidentally led everyone straight into a series of interdimensional portals!  Solve a series of Conga-Based puzzles across space and time and above all else:
Keep
The Party
Going!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together."
